ctx: intros a b c H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment a, b, c : Z H1 : pytha_set a b c H2 : Zodd a Unable to unify "pos_triple ?M1889 ?M1890 ?M1891 /\\ ?M1889 * ?M1889 + ?M1890 * ?M1890 = ?M1891 * ?M1891" with "exists p q m : Z, a = m * (q * q - p * p) /\\ b = 2 * m * (p * q) /\\ c = m * (p * p + q * q) /\\ m >= 0 /\\ cond_pq p q".

original: intros a b c H1 H2. apply pytha_thm1 in H1. apply pytha_thm2. unfold is_pytha, pytha_set in *.
